description.html:
@iche033 noticed in pull request 3086 that one of the kinematic loop tests didn't work with the Dantzig LCP solver. This was reported upstream and partially fixed in dart 6.8, so I've enabled the test case that now works for the Dantzig solver. I did this by adding an extra TEST_F case when dart 6.8+ is available.

I also changed DARTPhysics::SetSolverType to return without updating the internal sdf data if the solver type is unknown, so that the expectation that the solver type matches what we tried to set it to is more meaningful.

  • DARTPhysics::SetSolverType: return without updating sdf if solver type is unknown

  • Run AnchoredLoop test with dantzig solver, since it now works in dart 6.8

#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3086/fix-2605-kinematic-loops-for-dart-67-and/diff#comment-96097536

title.raw: Run Kinematic AnchoredLoop test with dantzig solver, since it now works in dart 6.8
